news.title: Summons servers’ hunt for Conor McGregor called off after lawyer agrees to respond to US sexual assault civil lawsuit
news.summary: Summons servers have been called off the hunt for Conor McGregor after his lawyer agreed to respond to a civil lawsuit alleging he sexually assaulted a woman in the US.

news.title: Arts Council asked for sexual identity and religion of those seeking grants
news.summary: The Data Protection Commissioner (DPC) has written to the Arts Council asking for further details on the “nature and content” of questions asked of artists when they were applying for bursary grants earlier this year.

news.title: Sutton planning row: An Bord Pleanála grants retention for house almost twice as big as planned
news.summary: An Bord Pleanála has granted retention for a house in north Dublin nearly double in size to previously approved plans and rejected claims it would devalue neighbouring properties worth €1m.

news.title: Ex-boyfriend of ‘Peru Two’ Michaela McCollum charged with drug offences
news.summary: Woman-beating bully Dwayne Mullan was remanded into custody yesterday, charged with criminal damage and having cannabis.

news.title: ‘I didn’t have any supports when I went through miscarriage’ – senator disappointed after Government stalls pregnancy loss bill
news.summary: A senator who shared her seven-week baby scan in the Seanad to highlight shortcomings in laws around miscarriage expressed disappointment that the Government has stalled on giving more rights to parents.

news.title: Three Irish hotels named among Europe’s best in Travel + Leisure awards
news.summary: Three Irish hotels have been named among Europe's best in Travel + Leisure's World's Best Awards for 2025.

news.title: Lucinda O’Sullivan’s restaurant review: I’d love to say it was the gourmet experience promised but this Dublin city centre revamp fell short of the mark
news.summary: First impressions are lasting impressions, they say, which makes the role of the meeter/greeter in any restaurant, hotel, or cafe a vital one.

news.title: ‘My grandfather left my mother a site in his will but she never got it – and now my uncle has sold the land. What can we do?’
news.summary: Query:  My uncle inherited all of my late grandfather’s farm in the south of the country when he died 15 years ago. Before he died, though, he told my mother she could have a site on the farm and referenced it in his will.

news.title: Meet the Limerick farmer ‘who loves the craic’ making millions laugh online
news.summary: He’s been compared to the likes of Pat Shortt and Jon Kenny, but Fin Walsh describes himself as “an Irish farmer who loves the craic”.

news.title: Paul Kimmage: Revealing the links between the Team Sky masseur and a convicted doping doctor at the Tour de France
news.summary: It was late last Sunday evening when Sebastian Krause arrived in Lille. He had taken a flight from Munich, and a train from Paris and left first thing the next morning in a car to Dunkirk.
